info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 10:27PM EST until January 07 at 10:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 5 inches, heaviest over northern St Joseph county north of US20. * WHERE...In Indiana, St. Joseph and Elkhart Counties. In Michigan, St. Joseph County. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 10 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will mainly impact the Friday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...It will be cold tonight, with wind chills dropping to 3 to 10 below zero. Make sure to dress warmly if outside tonight or Friday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
